FLY ASH

TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS

SYSTEMA LEONARDOTM

Helping power stations to go green while converting their environmental liability into a cash generating asset

SYSTEMA LEONARDOTM

So, you have some good precipitators at your power plant ensuring that there is little to no smoke entering the atmosphere but now you have mountains of ash piling up. You'd rather not dump it but the cement industry can not utilise all of it. What choice do you have?

Vecor's Systema LeonardoTM solution forms a cornerstone of Vecor's mission to assist power stations to comprehensively utilise their fly ash resources. Watch our video to find out how your power station can:

  • Improve environmental CSR
  • Eliminate dumping costs
  • Enjoy a new revenue stream
